SELECT m.permission_code FROM rl_role_permission rrp LEFT JOIN base_menu m ON rrp.resource_id = m.id LEFT JOIN rl_user_role rur ON rur.role_id = rrp.role_id WHERE rur.user_id = #{userId} and rrp.resource_type = 'menu' UNION SELECT o.permission_code FROM rl_role_permission rrp LEFT JOIN base_operation o ON rrp.resource_id = o.id LEFT JOIN rl_user_role rur ON rur.role_id = rrp.role_id WHERE rur.user_id = #{userId} and rrp.resource_type = 'operation'

SELECT m.id AS id, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_path AS menuPath, m.menu_icon AS menuIcon, m.parent_id AS parentId FROM rl_user_role rur INNER JOIN rl_role_menu rrm ON rur.role_id = rrm.role_id INNER JOIN base_menu m ON rrm.menu_id = m.id WHERE rur.user_id = #{userId}
